name: places/ChIJ43cjAv9bwokRn4BpiNS7irg
adrFormatAddress: PX2M+PR, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text: A nice cafe that is open only during the warm season. It is located inside the beautiful green Battery Park. We come here every summer to enjoy the view of the Statue of Liberty and sum up our personal year. I love this place.

text.text: A nice cafe that is open only during the warm season. It is located inside the beautiful green Battery Park. We come here every summer to enjoy the view of the Statue of Liberty and sum up our personal year. I love this place.

originalText.text: We happened to be at the Battery and wanted coffee and snacks and decided to have bagels. It's certainly not cheap but it was convenient, and we resigned ourselves to paying a lot for only adequate refreshment. But we were actually really surprised by just how good both the coffee and bagels were! (And we've lived in NYC—we know that it's very possible to get very bad coffee and bagels there!) Service was about as good as it could be given that there was only one server on when we came, and she was dealing with several customers; she dealt with being a little pressured very well (and she was joined by someone else soon after). But it was the quality of the coffee and bagels that really bowled us over. Better than they had any business being from a random little tourist kiosk.

originalText.text:
I was excited to check out this little spot bc it’s so convenient for bike rides through Battery. The morning I went, the baristas were…nice…but very disinterested and also somewhat rude, and they had quickly sold out of cold brew, but accommodated with an iced Americano. I asked for almond milk; the barista forgot so I had to ask again. Overall it was good coffee and the location can’t be beat, but it’s unfortunately your only outdoor coffee/snack option in the area.

Edit - Jan 2024 | hours say they are open, but they are 100% not open.

originalText.text: Pretty terrible cappuccino. Basically drip coffee with foam on top. Would have been happy with it if that's what I ordered. May be ok for buying water or something, go elsewhere for coffee

originalText.text: If they weren't so busy chatting they might have heard the full order, had to ask twice for a hot dog and never received a soda. There's a good Starbucks nearby
